Dear John,

Over the weekend I implemented a repository and unit of work pattern in an application I am building. This was heaviliy inspired by the Data Models, Entity Framework, and Data Patterns module of your Pluralsight course Single Page Apps with HTML5, Web API, Knockout and jQuery.

I added a notice saying the above and the license of CodeCamper to the project.

See https://github.com/erooijak/oogstplanner/commit/7834f7ed57eb711d22bda9880276ec0b0f85284d.

I hope that will do. :-)

Thanks for the course and the project.
